cast.name: 罗伯特·鲍威尔 Robert Powell

this_title: The Real Jesus of Nazareth Season 1
introduction: With the help of the latest archaeological and historical research actor Robert Powell takes a journey through the Holy Land to discover thereal Jesus of Nazareth, a character he played in one of the most successful TV series of all time ‘Jesus of Nazareth’.More than just a tale of history and archeology, Robert will be using his unique gifts as an actor to build a picture of the character of Jesus,speculating on this remarkable figure, while always being guided with the most rigorous contemporary academic research.S1 E1 The Lost YearsS1 E2 The Ministry BeginsS1 E3 From Galilee to JerusalemS1 E4 The Final DaysHost: Robert PowellNarrator: Judd HirschProduction: [Impossible Factual](https://www.impossiblefactual.com/the-real-jesus-of-nazareth/)
chinese_title: The Real Jesus of Nazareth Season 1
